text:
Hey guys,

I just came to have a look in this channel to see if anyone was having the same problem I have and found your issue <@U25C65C3S>! I'm also in the same situation as yourself and need to order Projects based on the order of the Foreign ID list.

Did you manage to find a solution to this?
The "id's' of the rows are not sequential either.
I think it's a definate issue that needs to be addressed. (and seems like an easy fix - just follow the order of the childs selected)
